item.title: paswitch-rs
item.description: I recently wrote a CLI tool (paswitch-rs) which combines the listing of pulse devices to the setting of a sink for all outputs. This is nothing new as you could manually change the devices via pavucontrol or using pactl list and finding your target sink and passing that id to paswitch. I have recently swapped over to using Pipewire and the number of pulse entities I now have has shot up from ~6 to over 40.

item.title: Syncing EteSync CalDav calendars into Spacemacs and OrgMode
item.description: Add additional packages dotspacemacs-additional-packages '( org-caldav ) Configuring your Calendars (setq org-caldav-url "http://127.0.0.1:37358/rob@robertplant.io") (setq org-caldav-calendar-id "calendarId") (setq org-caldav-check-dav "http://127.0.0.1:37358/rob@robertplant.io") (setq org-caldav-inbox "~/org/Calendar.org") (setq org-icalendar-timezone "Europe/London") (setq org-icalendar-date-time-format ";TZID=%Z:%Y%m%dT%H%M%S") Setup EteSync DAV EteSyncDAV

item.title: Emacs - Disable creation of lockfiles per project
item.description: To disable lockfiles on Emacs project add this into .dir-locals.el ((nil (create-lockfiles . nil) )) This can be very useful when working on CRA or Expo that watch for file changes and throw errors when the lock files are found and it attempts to read them, even though they are just symlinks.
